Description:
Parisima Talent is looking to hire for the position of Project Engineer with one of our clients.Position: Project EngineerJob location: Abu DhabiSummary:Experienced Project Engineer with offshore experience, responsible for planning, executing, and managing engineering projects. Ensure adherence to safety standards, quality benchmarks, and project objectives.Responsibilities:Plan projects, define scope, objectives, and requirements.
Develop ARAMCO-compliant engineering designs.
Manage project schedules, milestones, and cross-functional teams.
Estimate budgets, control costs, and monitor expenses.
Identify, mitigate project risks, prioritize safety.
Ensure compliance with industry standards, regulations.
Oversee quality control, assurance processes.
Communicate clearly with stakeholders.
Document project progress, generate technical reports.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field.
Proven ARAMCO project experience.
Offshore experience.
Proficient in project management tools.
Strong problem-solving, communication skills.
Familiarity with industry codes, standards.
